name: The Nature of Growth - Firith Spring jam 2021 entry
name_original: The Nature of Growth - Firith Spring jam 2021 entry
description:
Made for Firith Great Spring Jam 2021,  this game is a message about the importance of maintaining care for our lovely environment.

This was the first game jam project that I have made, and could not have completed it without all the help I got.

Become the embodiment of mother nature in a short tale of redemption, fight enemies that will grow the longer that they live for to save the world from pollution.

A pixel art game made with Godot.

This game is controller compatible and it is encouraged that one is used
